
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
args <- expand.grid(n1 = c(100, 250, 500),
                    p1 = c(0.19, 0.29),#seq(0.19, 0.29, by = 0.02),
                    p2 = 0.29,  # seq(0.19, 0.29, by = 0.02)
                    q = c(0.11, 0.17, 0.2),
                    degree = c("True", "False")
                    ) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(n2 = 1000 - n1) %>%
  rowid_to_column(var = "job_id_original")
args %>%
  write.csv(file = "args_imbalanced.csv", row.names = FALSE)


```


```{r}
small_args <- expand.grid(n1 = c(100),
                    p1 = c(0.19, 0.29),
                    p2 = c(0.29, 0.19),
                    q = c(0.11),
                    degree = c("True", "False")
                    ) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(n2 = 1000 - n1) %>%
  rowid_to_column(var = "small_job_id")
small_args %>%
  write.csv(file = "small_args.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
